scripts.py: protoc --proto_path=./discord_protos/ --python_out=discord_protos PreloadedUserSettings.proto FrecencyUserSettings.proto ApplicationUserRoleConnection.proto AcknowledgedApplicationDisclosures.proto PremiumMarketingComponentProperties.proto
scripts.js: protoc --proto_path=./discord_protos/ --ts_out src/proto PreloadedUserSettings.proto FrecencyUserSettings.proto ApplicationUserRoleConnection.proto AcknowledgedApplicationDisclosures.proto PremiumMarketingComponentProperties.proto
